item.title: Axon Vs. Flock: Two Policing Tech Giants Just Had A Big Falling Out
item.description: Billionaire Axon chief Rick Smith says he’s “embarrassed” to have recommended Flock’s car surveillance tools to cops.

item.title: Trump Shields Disinformation And Censors Health Data. It Will Affect You
item.description: HHS websites and the health data they contain are essential sources of public information. They should be free of political interference.

item.title: Actors, Authors And Other Celebrities Who Published Science Papers
item.description: As of last month, George R.R. Martin joins a growing list of authors, actors and musicians who have published scientific research papers.
